key_risks: Regulatory and legal challenges, including unauthorized practice of law (UPL) lawsuits
Customer complaints regarding quality of legal advice and standardized documents
Market dependence on the U.S. and limited international presence
Shareholder investigations into fiduciary duty breaches
controversies: Ongoing lawsuits and regulatory scrutiny for unauthorized practice of law (UPL)
Shareholder investigation into potential breaches of fiduciary duties
social_issues: Mixed customer reviews impacting trust and brand reputation
Need for improved transparency and service quality to maintain customer trust
governance_issues: Potential breaches of fiduciary duties by directors
Reliance on partnerships with licensed attorneys and compliance with state-specific regulations
